Name: Watermelon Caprese (PH)
Description: Slices of watermelon and cheese tossed in oil and skewered. Includes dandelion leaves instead of basil.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Slices of watermelon and cheese tossed in oil and skewered. Includes dandelion leaves instead of basil.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: Slices of watermelon and cheese tossed in oil and skewered. Includes dandelion leaves instead of basil.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Wassermelonenscheiben und Käse in Öl gewendet und aufgespießt. Statt mit Basilikum wird das Gericht mit Löwenzahnblättern garniert.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Slices of watermelon and cheese tossed in oil and skewered. Includes dandelion leaves instead of basil.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Slices of watermelon and cheese tossed in oil and skewered. Includes dandelion leaves instead of basil.
DescriptionLocalization.it: Slices of watermelon and cheese tossed in oil and skewered. Includes dandelion leaves instead of basil.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: Slices of watermelon and cheese tossed in oil and skewered. Includes dandelion leaves instead of basil.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Slices of watermelon and cheese tossed in oil and skewered. Includes dandelion leaves instead of basil.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Ломтики арбуза и сыра, политые маслом и насаженные на шпажку. Вместо базилика используют листья одуванчика.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Slices of watermelon and cheese tossed in oil and skewered. Includes dandelion leaves instead of basil.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 西瓜片和奶酪拌在油里，串起来。包括蒲公英叶而不是罗勒。
